headline.print_headline: Using a Light Touch to Attack a Dark Subject
headline.seo: Humorous Videos Attack Dangers of Coal - Campaign Spotlight
headline.main: Using a Light Touch to Attack a Dark Subject

docs.lead_paragraph: The Sierra Club, aided by a $50 million grant, is introducing its first major national video campaign to promote its Beyond Coal initiative.
docs.snippet: The Sierra Club, aided by a $50 million grant, is introducing its first major national video campaign to promote its Beyond Coal initiative.
